p: In rats in the five model groups (n=50), 40% carbon tetrachloride (CCl 4) in olive oil was injected in the back to develop the rat model of liver fibrosis. The first dose of CCl 4 was 1.0 ml/kg, and then 0.5 ml/kg was injected twice weekly for 13 weeks. In the rat control group (n=10), rats were injected subcutaneously with an equivalent volume of normal saline, twice weekly for 13 weeks.
